page.title: 18CHURCH FETE
page.content: . The church fete is held in the Rectory garden on the first Saturday in September.This year the fete was opened by a member of the staff of Wiltshire radio.Stalls were placed around the garden, and these included cakes,bottles,produce,toys,crafts and sweets.There was a draw as well.In the middle of the garden there was a merry go round,which some men had to push to make it go.A lot of children had turns on it. In one corner there was a coconut shy and in another corner there was bowling. At one time the prize for the bowling was a pig, but for a long time now it has been money. At the end of the fete the prizes for the draw are made. This year there were over thirty prizes. The profit was Â£1600.
